p: Namisol ® is a new formulation of a tablet containing purified Δ9-THC (>98%) in fixed dosages with high and predictable bioavailability and beneficial pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamics characteristics after oral administration [ 172]. Echo Pharmaceuticals BV has been formulated Namisol ® using a patented drug delivery technology, Alitra™, to improve absorption and distribution of compounds with low water solubility. The Namisol ® was developed to improve abdominal pain resulting from chronic pancreatitis (CP).
